creator: DoSho
title: DIYCintiq Drawing Practise - Bruce Lee
description: This project documents the process of practicing drawing using a DIY Cintiq and Zbrush 3.5 PaintStop, specifically featuring a drawing of Bruce Lee.
steps: The provided text is introductory in nature and doesn't contain explicitly numbered steps.
It focuses on the context of using a DIY Cintiq for drawing practice, specifically a portrait of Bruce Lee.
The process involves using Zbrush 3.5 PaintStop (or a similar application) with the DIY Cintiq to create the drawing.
